byline.original: By JENNIFER CUTRARO and HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO

abstract: Creating research projects to be conducted on the International Space Station.
snippet: Creating research projects to be conducted on the International Space Station.
lead_paragraph: Overview | In this lesson, students read about a new contest seeking student science experiments to be conducted on the International Space Station. They learn more about space-based research, design experiments they would like to see carried out in microgravity and develop scripts for video pitches to promote their ideas.

headline.main: A Matter of Gravity: Developing Space-Based Experiments
